sentences:
Penny Arcade is a webcomic focused on video games and video game culture , written by Jerry Holkins and illustrated by Mike Krahulik .
The comic debuted in 1998 on the website loonygames.com .
Since then , Holkins and Krahulik have established their own site , which is typically updated with a new comic strip each Monday , Wednesday , and Friday .
The comics are accompanied by regular updates on the site 's blog .
Penny Arcade is among the most popular and longest running webcomics currently online , listed in 2010 as having 3.5 million readers .
Holkins and Krahulik are among the first webcomic creators successful enough to make a living from their work .
In addition to the comic , Holkins and Krahulik also created Child 's Play , a children 's charity ; PAX , a gaming convention ; Penny Arcade TV , a YouTube channel ; Pinny Arcade , a pin exchange ; and the episodic video game with Hothead Games and Zeboyd Games .
